{"id":1175695718,"question_id":3262,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1707972358,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"136 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1175695718/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Polygon With the Largest Perimeter","memory":"95.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long largestPerimeter(vector<int>& nums) {\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        using ll = long long;\n        vector<ll> v{0};\n        for(auto n: nums){\n            v.push_back(n + v.back());\n        }\n        v.erase(v.begin());\n        ll ans = -1;\n        for(int i = 2; i < nums.size(); i++){\n            if(nums[i] < v[i-1]) ans = ll(nums[i]) + ll(v[i-1]);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-polygon-with-the-largest-perimeter","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
